title: Bloomberg Markets: DraftKings CEO on Regulation, Merger
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: DraftKings CEO on Regulation, Merger
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jason Robins Chief Executive Officer DraftKings Discussing the business of daily fantasy sports, dealing with state regulations and merging with FanDuel.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
